items.title: Journalists: How to Report on Deaths in Jails and Prisons
items.description: When you get a tip about a death or multiple deaths in your local jail or prison, there are concrete steps you can take to start investigating.

items.title: Katrice Hardy Named CEO of The Marshall Project
items.description: The industry veteran will lead both the newsroom and business operations.

items.title: The Trans Woman Who Sued the Federal Prisons (and Won) Settles Her Remaining Cases
items.description: Days before Trump’s inauguration, the Bureau of Prisons agreed to pay Grace Pinson $95,000 to drop more than a dozen pending lawsuits.

items.title: How Trump’s Immigration Orders Represent a Seismic Shift on Enforcement
items.description: The president’s actions move the federal government toward his promised hardline position. But some executive orders will face court challenges.

items.title: Trump’s Order Takes Aim at Transgender People in Prison
items.description: Few trans people receive gender-affirming housing and care in the federal prison system. This executive order would make it even harder.
